attributes.action: Investigate the accountability and responsibilities of Borough Councils.
attributes.additional_details:
SAVE Hookmeadow: Face book
Getsurrey: Newspaper articles: Chobham woman and Eco cabin.
Planning Inspectorate Appeal:  APP/D3640/W/16/3144389: Hook Meadow, Philpot Lane, GU24 8HD.
attributes.background:
My aim is to try and save my home and life as well as ensuring that the council and certain staff/councillors are held responsible, unfortunately councils have complete autonomy.
The Government must investigate and hopefully stop the persecution and torture that I have endured for fourteen years

rejection.details:
We are not sure whether you want the Government or Parliament to examine 
--- all accountability issues in all borough councils
--- planning accountability issues in all borough councils
--- the accountability of Surrey Heath Borough Council for its planning decisions.

You may wish to submit a petition which makes clearer the action you with the UK Government or Parliament to take.
